description: Detects suspicious processes based on name and location that access the browser credential stores which can be the sign of credential stealing
name: Browser Credential Store Access
query: ((file.path.text:(*\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Default\\Network\\Cookies* OR *\\Appdata\\Local\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Default\\Login\ Data* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User\ Data\\Local\ State*) OR file.path.text:(*\\Appdata\\Local\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WebCache\\WebCacheV01.dat OR *\\cookies.sqlite OR *release\\key3.db OR *release\\key4.db OR *release\\logins.json)) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:(*\\firefox.exe OR *\\chrome.exe)) OR (process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\*)) OR (process.executable.text:(*\\MsMpEng.exe OR *\\MpCopyAccelerator.exe OR *\\thor64.exe OR *\\thor.exe)) OR (process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"System" AND process.parent.executable.text:"Idle"))))
author: frack113
